mapper.select: SELECT id, type, status, point, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate, delete_flg FROM info2 ORDER BY id ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE info2 SET status = #{status}, point = #{point}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE info2 SET delete_flg = 1, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
